home.name: Nahuel Argañaraz
home.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Full Stack Developer with solid experience in developing applications using technologies such as JavaScript, Java, NodeJS, HTML/CSS, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. I also have deep knowledge of using modern frameworks like React to build dynamic and efficient web applications.

I specialize in agile methodologies like SCRUM and am familiar with project management tools like Trello and Jira, which allows me to adapt and collaborate effectively in team environments. My approach is based on organization and delivering high-quality solutions.

I am motivated by the opportunity to contribute to innovative projects and be part of teams that are driving technological advancement. My goal is to contribute my skills and experience to develop products that make a positive and lasting impact.
